hymn.title: Oh, how glorious is Thy table, Lord
hymn.category: Praise of the Lord—Remembrance of Him

Hal -- le -- lu -- jah! Hal -- le -- lu -- jah! Hal -- le -- lu -- jah for this feast! Hal -- le -- lu -- jah! Hal -- le -- lu -- jah! Oh, how glo -- rious is Thy ta -- ble, Lord!

lyrics.stanza: Oh, how glorious is Thy table, Lord, Thou, the man, our Host, presiding, In Thy house, Thy home, abiding; Oh, how glorious is Thy table, Lord!
Hallelujah! Hallelujah! Hallelujah for this feast! Hallelujah! Hallelujah! Oh, how glorious is Thy table, Lord!
How enjoyable Thy table, Lord, As we fellowship around it, Hallelujah, we have found it, How enjoyable Thy table, Lord!
